MCQ: Which movement originated in Europe in the late 18th century and peaked in the first half of the 19th century?
Choices: a: Baroque | b: Romanticism | c: Renaissance | d: Neoclassicism

MCQ: Who are some of the famous poets associated with Romanticism?
Choices: a: Shakespeare, Milton, Dante | b: Wordsworth, Coleridge, Byron | c: Homer, Virgil, Ovid | d: Chaucer, Spenser, Donne

MCQ: What did Romantic painters often depict in their works?
Choices: a: Cityscapes and urban life | b: Everyday scenes of domestic life | c: Untamed landscapes and emotional experiences | d: Abstract geometric shapes

MCQ: Which composers were part of the Romantic era in music?
Choices: a: Bach, Handel, Vivaldi | b: Beethoven, Schubert, Chopin | c: Mozart, Haydn, Salieri | d: Stravinsky, Debussy, Ravel
a: Cold and mechanical | b: Emotional, individualistic, and nature-centered | c: Logical and rational | d: Societal norms and conventions
